title: Vehicle Price Analysis Package
text: full documentation AutoPrice package available . README includes: - Package Overview: description AutoPrice main features. Installation Instructions: install package GitHub. Example Usage: Loading dataset, conducting basic analysis, generating summary statistics. Shiny App Instructions: start use Shiny app. Contributing License: Information contributing package licensing.

title: Vehicle Price Analysis Package
text: AutoPrice package provides tools analyzing vehicle price trends across production years, vehicle makes, models, . package designed support data-driven insights automotive industry, focusing price changes 2023 2025 help users understand factors driving price fluctuations.

title: Vehicle Price Analysis Package
text: Dataset Access: cleaned dataset (vehicles_clean) 9,000 vehicles, covering essential details like price, year, make, model, fuel type, mileage, transmission, body type. Shiny App: interactive Shiny app allows users explore vehicle price distributions, filter data various attributes, download filtered results. Data Analysis Tools: Functions analyzing price trends production year, vehicle make, attributes.

title: Vehicle Price Analysis Package
text: can install development version AutoPrice GitHub :

title: Vehicle Price Analysis Package
text: primary dataset, vehicles_clean, can accessed directly package. dataset includes vehicles manufactured 2023 2025, fields price, year, make, model, fuel.

title: Vehicle Price Analysis Package
text: ’s simple analysis shows distribution vehicle prices year:
code: library(ggplot2)  ggplot(vehicles_clean, aes(x = year, y = price)) +   geom_point(alpha = 0.5) +   labs(title = "Vehicle Price by Production Year",        x = "Year",        y = "Price (USD)") +   theme_minimal()

title: Vehicle Price Analysis Package
text: can also view basic summary statistics vehicle prices:
code: summary(vehicles_clean$price) #>    Min. 1st Qu.  Median    Mean 3rd Qu.    Max.  #>   21637   36891   47165   49734   58750  110150

title: Vehicle Price Analysis Package
text: AutoPrice package includes Shiny app interactive exploration dataset. app provides tools filtering vehicle data year, price range, make, transmission type, body type. app generates histogram showing distribution prices based filters, users can download filtered data.

title: Vehicle Price Analysis Package
text: launch Shiny app, use following command: app running, can: Filter data year (2023, 2024, 2025), price range, make, transmission, body type. View histogram vehicle prices based selected filters. Download filtered dataset analysis.

title: Vehicle Price Analysis Package
text: welcome contributions enhance functionality AutoPrice. ’d like contribute, please submit pull request open issue GitHub.

title: Prepare AutoPrice Dataset — prepare_autoprice_dataset
text: function prepares AutoPrice dataset reading cleaning raw vehicle data.

title: Prepare AutoPrice Dataset — prepare_autoprice_dataset
text: file_path Character. file path raw dataset CSV file. overwrite Logical. Whether overwrite existing vehicles_clean dataset.

title: Prepare AutoPrice Dataset — prepare_autoprice_dataset
text: cleaned dataset saved vehicles_clean package's data folder.

title: Run the Shiny Application — VehiclePriceApp
text: function runs Shiny application exploring vehicle prices 2023 2025. provides interactive features filter data year, price range, make, transmission, body type. Users can view distribution vehicle prices download filtered dataset CSV file.

title: Run the Shiny Application — VehiclePriceApp
code: shinyApp(ui = ui, server = server) #> Error in shinyApp(ui = ui, server = server): could not find function "shinyApp"

what: Server Logic for the Shiny App — VehiclePriceAppServer
title: Server Logic for the Shiny App — VehiclePriceAppServer
text: server logic manages interactive behavior Shiny app. filters dataset based user input renders histogram shows distribution vehicle prices. Additionally, users can download filtered data CSV file.

title: Server Logic for the Shiny App — VehiclePriceAppServer
Server Logic for the Shiny App — VehiclePriceAppServer
text: input User input UI (e.g., year, price range, make, transmission, body type). output output displayed app (e.g., plot download handler).

title: Server Logic for the Shiny App — VehiclePriceAppServer
text: reactive plot download handler filtered data.

what: Shiny App for Vehicle Price Analysis — VehiclePriceAppUI
title: Shiny App for Vehicle Price Analysis — VehiclePriceAppUI
text: Shiny application allows users interactively explore vehicle price distributions based year, price range, make, transmission type, body type. app visualizes price distribution histogram provides option download filtered data.

title: Shiny App for Vehicle Price Analysis — VehiclePriceAppUI
text: UI layout Shiny app.

title: Shiny App for Vehicle Price Analysis — VehiclePriceAppUI
text: User Interface (UI) Shiny App UI defines layout appearance Shiny app. includes selectors year, price range, vehicle make, transmission type, body type. download button allows users download filtered dataset.

title: Shiny App for Vehicle Price Analysis — VehiclePriceAppUI
text: Select Year: Choose vehicle production year (2023, 2024, 2025). Price Range Slider: Adjust price range filter vehicles based price. Select Make: Choose one vehicle manufacturers. Select Transmission Type: Filter vehicles based transmission type (e.g., Automatic, Manual). Select Body Type: Filter vehicles based body type (e.g., SUV, Sedan). Download Button: Download filtered data CSV file.
